creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Makiji Hase
description: fan painting: three pine trees with gnarled roots at L; rocks and boulders, other foliage near bottom; vines in tree at R
marks: Signature and Seals center L edge: [ 梅逸] (Baiitsu)
medium: Ink and colors on mica paper
title: Pines
